page.title: 06Harpsden School Children
page.content: Of the 48 Children in Harpsden Parochial School,28 are in the Junior Class & 20 in the Infants.31 Children come from Henley,12 from Harpsden & 5 from Shiplake.Most Children travel by car-33,12 walk & 3 cycle.There are 19 girls(12 Juniors,7 Infants) & 29 boys (16 Juniors,13 Infants).Of the Juniors, four are aged 11,five are 10,five are 9 ten are 8, & four are 7.Of the Infants, four are 7,ten are 6 & four are 7 years Every child ,except one,has a bike,all but 9 have pets & all but one have a car.22 Children have two cars & 3 have three cars.Four Children are the only child in the family,21 come from "two child family",20 from a "three child family" & 3 from a "four child family". The average number is 2.45 children per family.All but the new 5 year olds can swim,some 800m.All but 7 can play the Recorder & 6 play the Violin at school.
